tool.name: FFEval
tool.description: Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir truth && ln -s '$truth' 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' && #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out && #end if #if $abort_reasons: mkdir abort_reasons && ln -s '$abort_reasons' 'abort_reasons/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $abort_reasons.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($abort_reasons.ext)' && #end if #if "out_roc_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') mkdir out_roc && #end if
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -truth 'truth/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $truth.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($truth.ext)' #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' #end if #if $abort_reasons: -abort_reasons 'abort_reasons/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $abort_reasons.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($abort_reasons.ext)' #end if #if "out_roc_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') -out_roc 'out_roc/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' #end if #if len(str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',')) == 0 | tee '$stdout' #end if
## Postprocessing #if "out_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("featurexml")}' '$out' #end if #if "out_roc_FLAG" in str($OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS).split(',') && mv 'out_roc/output.${gxy2omsext("csv")}' '$out_roc' #end if #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Feature input file, which contains the data to be tested against the truth file
Truth feature file that defines what features should be found
Allowed tolerance of RT relative to average feature RT span
Allowed absolute tolerance of RT (overwrites 'rt_tol' if set above zero)
Allowed tolerance in m/z (is divided by charge)
Feature file containing seeds with abort reasons
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS
param.label: Optional outputs
param.option: out_roc (If given, a ROC curve file is created (ROC points based on intensity threshold))

data.name: out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: out_roc
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: out_roc
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "out_roc_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Evaluation tool for feature detection algorithms.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/nightly/html/UTILS_FFEval.html
